title: Vizag Port Trust Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Marine Engineer Post
description: Visakhapatnam Port Trust has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Marine Engineer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech can grab this chance and apply for the Vizag Port Trust Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the walk-in at the address given below. If you are lookin...
